mapper.sql: select m.menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, path, component, perms, icon, type, order_num, create_time, update_time from t_menu m
mapper.select: where m.type <> 1 and m.menu_id in (select distinct rm.menu_id from t_role_menu rm left join t_role r on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user_role ur on (ur.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}) order by m.order_num

select distinct m.perms from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join t_role_menu rm on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_menu m on (m.menu_id = rm.menu_id) where u.username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''
